alert.note: Alert for Calloway; Christian; Todd; Trigg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 09 at 2:30AM EST until January 10 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 3 AM CST WEDNESDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Wind gusts overnight are now forecast to remain below Wind Advisory levels, so the Wind Advisory has been cancelled. A second Wind Advisory will go into effect at noon CST today, with west winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Calloway, Trigg, Christian and Todd Counties. * WHEN...From noon today to 3 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy rainfall tonight will create saturated soil conditions, so a few uprooted trees cannot be ruled out.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
